thread.title: Outrage in Rio after councilwoman shot dead

title: Outrage in Rio after councilwoman shot dead
text:
Outrage in Rio after councilwoman shot dead Thursday, March 15, 2018 - 01:24 
A popular Rio de Janeiro city councilwoman who was an outspoken critic of police killings of poor residents was gunned down in what police, prosecutors and even drug gang leaders said on Thursday looked like a political assassination.   
A popular Rio de Janeiro city councilwoman who was an outspoken critic of police killings of poor residents was gunned down in what police, prosecutors and even drug gang leaders said on Thursday looked like a political assassination.  //reut.rs/2Ivubun
